question:
Consider the following statements about the recently proposed Women Entrepreneurial and Innovation Cell:
  1. It will be created by Niti Aayog
  2. It aims to support the women in the country through Mudra micro-loan scheme
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation:
Recently, government has proposed to set up the Women Entrepreneurial and Innovation Cell under Niti Aayog. The cell aims to offer financial support and mentorship to women entrepreneurs. Some of the salient features of proposed Women Entrepreneurial and Innovation Cell in India are:
  • It will be majorly financed by the Mudra Fund and other financial institutions.
  • The Atal Innovation Mission would also partner with the state government for the WE-Hub.
  • A technology Fund (T-Fund) will be constituted with a corpus of Rs 15 crore dedicated especially for the women entrepreneurs.
